document_data.caption: A shield made of arjale, tantulhor and silver
document_data.name: Tantulhor
document_data.mainbody: '''Tantulhor''' was a metal only found in the [[Nine Hells]].{{Cite dragon/91/Nine Hells revisited|26}} Seldom found outside the infernal planes, it reached very high prices when sold on the [[Prime Material plane]].

Properties.Alloying: Tantulhor could be alloyed with [[arjale]] and [[silver]] to create an extremely durable yet pliable metal, of untarnished silvery color with flecks of green.

document_data.Applications: Tantulhor was used in the creation of [[:category:magic items|magic items]] such as the [[demonshield]]s of the [[Shoon Imperium]] or the [[rod]] of [[Dispater]]. It was also used to create the [[talisman]] of many [[devil]]s such as [[Zagan]] or the [[hamatula]]s.
document_data.Production: Tantulhor was mined by [[nupperibo]]s and [[spinagon]]s in [[Phlegethos]]{{Cite dragon/91/Nine Hells revisited|28-29}} They could also be found in [[Malbolge]] and [[Maladomini]], where it was less abundant.
